title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: A rainy day in the city, the ego vehicle is almost stopped at an intersection.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars on the road. The traffic light is red, and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is foggy, and the visibility is low.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the rain and the red traffic light. It is also maintaining a safe distance from the pedestrian and other vehicles on the road. The driver is being cautious and paying close attention to the road conditions and the surrounding traffic.
